traits.name: Thrust
traits.description: Up to +5-20% Power, scaling with Charge Time (Heavy Attack). Stacks 3 times.

traits.name: Deathblow
traits.description: Ignore Enemy Hit Mass for 3.5 seconds on Weak Spot Kill.

traits.name: All or Nothing
traits.description: Up to +2-5% Power, scaling with Stamina.

traits.name: Brutal Momentum
traits.description: Ignore Enemy Hit Mass for 2-4.5 seconds on Weak Spot Kill.

traits.name: Decapitator
traits.description: +10-25% Rending for 5 seconds on Enemy One-Shot. Stacks 3-5 times.

traits.name: Decimator (Combat Axe)
traits.description: Continuously chaining more than 2 attacks gives +8-20% Power on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Decimator (Tactical Axe)
traits.description: Continuously chaining more than 2 attacks gives +8-20% Power on Hit. Stacks 10 times.

traits.name: Decimator (Sapper Shovel)
traits.description: Continuously chaining more than 2 attacks gives +8-20% Power on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Headtaker
traits.description: +2-5% Power for 3.5s on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Headtaker (Heavy Sword)
traits.description: +7.5-15% Power for 3.5s on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Limbsplitter
traits.description: +10-25% on First Attack in a Chain. Subsequent Attacks have -10-25% Power.

traits.name: Shred
traits.description: +2-5% Bonus Critical Chance on repeated hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Slaughterer
traits.description: +10-15% Power for 3.5 seconds on kill. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Thunderous
traits.description: Target receives 1-4 Stacks of 5% Brittelness on Hit. Lasts 5s.

traits.name: Unstoppable Force
traits.description: Heavy Attacks ignore Hit Mass Bonus From Armour.

traits.name: Wrath
traits.description: +10-20% Cleave on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Bloodletter
traits.description: +2-4 Bleed Stacks from Special Attacks.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.description: +10-20% damage for 3 seconds on Multiple Hit.

traits.name: Bloodthirsty
traits.description: 100% Critical Chance on Special Attack Kill.

traits.name: Executor
traits.description: +2-5% on Repeated Weak Spot Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Hammerblow
traits.description: +10-25% Impact for 1.5 seconds on Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Inspiring Barrage
traits.description: Replenish 10% Toughness over time during Continuous Fire. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.name: Rev It Up
traits.description: +5-15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds on Weapon Speical Activation.

traits.name: Riposte
traits.description: +2-5% Critical Chance for 5 seconds on successful Dodge.

traits.name: Savage Sweep
traits.description: +100-200% Cleave for 3 seconds on Multiple Melee Hit.

traits.name: Skullcrusher
traits.description: Target receives 1-4 Stacks of 5% Damage on Stagger. Lasts 1-5 seconds.

traits.name: Trauma
traits.description: +5-10% Impact for 2 seconds on Repeated Hit. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Bash
traits.description: +1-4% Critical Chance for 3 seconds on Punishing Enemies.

traits.name: Confident Strike
traits.description: +5-8% Toughness on Chained Hit

traits.name: Devastating Strike
traits.description: Ignore Enemy hit mass on critical hit. Lasts 2-4 seconds.

traits.name: Devastating Strike (Cleaver)
traits.description: Ignore Enemy hit mass on critical hit. Lasts 3-4 seconds.

traits.name: Devastating Strike (Chainsword)
traits.description: Ignore Enemy hit mass on critical hit. Lasts 3-4 seconds.

traits.name: Momentum
traits.description: +7.5-15% Toughness on Multiple Melee Hit.

traits.name: Flesh Tearer
traits.description: 1-4 Bleed Stacks on Critical Hits

traits.name: Tenderiser
traits.description: +10-15% Power (next attack) on Special Action Hit.

traits.name: Haymaker
traits.description: +1-4% to Instakill human-sized enemies on Chained Heavy Hit. Stacks 5 Times.

traits.name: Lacerate
traits.description: +1-4 Bleed Stacks on non-Weak Spot Hits.

traits.name: Mercy Killer
traits.description: +20-50% Weak Spot Damage (Enemies with Bleed Stacks).

traits.name: Precognition
traits.description: +2-5% Weak Spot Damage & Critical Damage for 5 seconds on successful Dodge.

traits.name: Ruthless Backstab
traits.description: +20-50% Rending on Backstab Hit.

traits.name: Smackdown
traits.description: +5-10% Critical Chance for 2 seconds on Special Action Hit (Staggered Enemy).

traits.name: Uncanny Strike
traits.description: +6-20% Rending on enemy weak spot hit for 2.5 seconds. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Perfect Strike
traits.description: Critical Hits ignore Hit Mass Bonus from Armour

traits.name: Thunderstrike
traits.description: Target receives 1-4 Stacks of 5% Impact on Hit. Lasts 5s.

traits.name: Supercharge
traits.description: +1-4 Rending on Energised Hit.

traits.name: Vicious Slice
traits.description: +2-5% Damage to Target for each Enemy already Hit by the same Attack.

traits.name: Blazing Spirit (Force Sword)
traits.description: Enemy gains +2-4 Stacks of Soulblaze on Critical Hit.

traits.name: Deflector
traits.description: This Weapon blocks both Melee and Ranged attacks. Additionally, Block Cost is reduced by 0-15%.

traits.name: Exorcist
traits.description: Quell 2-5% of Peril on repeated weak spot hit.

traits.name: Superiority
traits.description: +5% Power for 5 seconds on Elite Kill. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Unstable Power
traits.description: Up to +2-5% Power, scaling with Peril.

traits.name: Sunder
traits.description: Your Energised Attacks have increased Cleave.

traits.name: Power Cycler
traits.description: Increased Energised Duration on Chained Energised Hits.

traits.name: Shock & Awe
traits.description: -25-40% Enemy Hit Mass for 0.5 seconds on kill. Stacks 5 times.

traits.name: Take a Swing
traits.description: +7.5-15% Weak Spot Damage for 3 seconds on Pushing Enemies.
